name: Egg Butter
author: epicureangela
summary: Use this unusual egg and butter spread as a sandwich filling, or as a topping for crackers or bagels.
directions: Place the eggs into a saucepan in a single layer and fill with water to cover the eggs by 1 inch
Cover the saucepan and bring the water to a boil over high heat
Once the water is boiling, remove from the heat and let the eggs stand in the hot water for 15 minutes
Cool the eggs under cold running water
Peel, and remove yolks from white
Chop yolks; reserve whites for another use
Beat butter in a large bowl until soft and fluffy
Mix in the egg yolks, cayenne pepper, and Worcestershire sauce
